fields.name: ApiKeyIdentifier
fields.description: A prefix send in the header before the actual token

fields.name: ApiKeyName
fields.description: The header name which the token is sent with

fields.name: AuthorizationEndpoint
fields.description: The endpoint used to authorize the user, used in Oauth 2.0 flow

fields.name: AuthorizationEndpointQueryParameters
fields.description: The query parameters used in authorization request, used in Oauth 2.0 flow

fields.name: FlowName
fields.description: Describes the flow name, for example 'AuthCode' for Oauth 2.0

fields.name: IsApiKeyInPostPayload
fields.description: Marks if the key should sent in header

fields.name: IsClientSecretInHeader
fields.description: Marks if we should send the client secret in header or payload, used in Oauth 2.0 flow

fields.name: RedirectionEndpoint
fields.description: The redirect endpoint where we will get the authorization code, used in Oauth 2.0 flow

fields.name: TokenEndpoint
fields.description: The endpoint used to issue a token, used in Oauth 2.0 flow

fields.name: TokenEndpointHeaders
fields.description: The query headers used in token request, used in Oauth 2.0 flow

fields.name: TokenEndpointQueryParameters
fields.description: The query parameters used in token request, used in Oauth 2.0 flow
